author: Erin Doherty
title: Fears mount over human trafficking of Ukrainian refugees
description: "You have to worry about any potential risks for trafficking — but also exploitation, and sexual exploitation and abuse."
content:
Concerns are mounting over how to protect the millions of women and children fleeing Ukraine from being targeted by human traffickers, AP reports.
